Posts.EditableText: I told myself as I was working on this game that I would make the source available once I was done to anyone who wanted to look at it. So, in the interest of closure, I am doing so now! The only real interest might be to see 1) how I did some HTML effects, and/or 2) how a game using my response library would look. As this is a game based on my response library, it will probably look a bit different than a normal Quest game. I just know I couldn't have written it without that library without going crazy. The bulk of the game logic is in the responses. The rest just provides the framework. Besides the files themselves, there is a manifest file in the zip called "File List.txt" that gives a summary of each file's function. If you decide to look and end up with any questions, feel free to let me know! (Posting note: the end-of-game images are too large to post here. If anyone wants them, I can make them available.) The current posted code is for version 1.1.
